gobblin.util.io

Class MeteredInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • gobblin.util.io.MeteredInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MeteredStream, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class MeteredInputStream
extends FilterInputStream
implements MeteredStream
    A FilterInputStream that counts the bytes read from the underlying InputStream.
